name: Brelyna Maryon
stunts: Arcane Stabilizer: Once per scene, cancel a minor magical complication aspect if Brelyna can narratively 'correct the pattern'.
Telvanni Recall: +2 to Lore when identifying ancient magical signatures or anomalies.
notes: Brelyna is a control-and-support mage. If protected and respected, she becomes terrifyingly useful against magical puzzles and relic phenomena.
combat_tactics: Creates advantages, summons distractions, stabilizes allies and magical effects; avoids spotlight unless necessary.
